name: 鄭有進
objective: 本課程主要在介紹物件導向設計原則以及軟體設計樣式技術。課程涵蓋的內容包括：軟體設計與設計樣式重要基礎概念以及生成、結構、行為三類設計樣式。探討在系統需求與需求規格之後，藉由物件導向結構設計與適當的選擇以發展系統，並運用設計樣式重構軟體系統的邏輯結構，以改進軟體設計。透過使用UML和Java實際開發軟體系統，學習者將有充分機會練習設計樣式之使用。
schedule:
Week 1-3. Review of OOP and unit testing: Term Frequency
Week 4-6. First design pattern example: Shapes Sorting
Week 7 Lab test 1
Week 8-13 Second design pattern example: Geometry
Week 14. Lab Test 2
Week 15-17 Principles of OOP and other patterns
Week 18. Final
scorePolicy: This course covers design patterns in a number of examples. Examples involve Java development. There will be eight assignments (30%), two lab tests (40%), plus one pen-and-paper final exam (30%).
materials:
Course repo: https://ssl-gitlab.csie.ntut.edu.tw/yccheng/dp2021s
Reference books:
1. Gamma, Erich, et al. Design patterns: elements of reusable object-oriented software. Pearson Education, 1994.
2. Eric Freeman, Elisabeth Robson, Bert Bates, Kathy Sierra: Head First Design Patterns (https://www.oreilly.com/library/view/head-first-design/0596007124/)
